title: Teams Changing Identities for 2017
itunes:title: Teams Changing Identities for 2017
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Patrick Claybon & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the Chiefs promoting Brett Veach to GM and the Panthers wanting Cam Newton to run less. The heroes also debate who will win the running back battle in Seattle and which teams are undergoing a facelift heading into next season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
